parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the idler shaft lever can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to a crash or loss of control, which can result in serious injury or death.
symptoms: pieces of metal in the crankcase
engine rattling or making unusual noises
balancer chain tensioner broken into multiple pieces
metal fragments in the oil pump mechanism.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the balancer shaft adjuster can cause catastrophic engine damage, leading to engine seizure at high speed, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.

The failure of the cam chain adjuster, also known as the "doohickey," can cause the engine to seize without warning, resulting in sudden loss of power and potentially leading to accidents or serious engine damage.
symptoms: Engine seizure or stalling without warning
